headline: PACCAR Parts Strength And Tariffs Shape Valuation And Earnings Outlook
summary: PACCAR reported record revenues from its parts and financial services divisions, despite weaker truck sales linked to production retooling and new Section 232 truck tariffs. Truck production faced disruptions as the company adjusted manufacturing lines, affecting deliveries in the latest reporting period. Management highlighted operational resilience and a diversified business model as key factors in offsetting tariff and production headwinds. PACCAR, traded as NasdaqGS:PCAR, is drawing...
